tag-namespace
*************


Description
===========

A managed container for defined tags. A tag namespace is unique in a
tenancy. For more information, see Managing Tags and Tag Namespaces.

**Warning:** Oracle recommends that you avoid using any confidential
information when you supply string values using the API.


Available Commands
==================

* add

* cascade-delete

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* reactivate

* remove

* retire

* update
